content: ## Example: Multi-instance performance This test measures how response time increases as requests per second increase. It looks at the response time when calling the Webhook Trigger node. Setup: - Hardware: seven ECS c5a.4xlarge instances (8GB RAM each) - n8n setup: two webhook instances, four worker instances, one database instance (MySQL), one main instance running n8n and Redis - Workflow: Webhook Trigger node, Edit Fields node - Multi-instance setups use [Queue mode](/hosting/scaling/queue-mode.md)
